title: If your cellular data is on, will it still run when your phone is turn off? - Quora

response.answer_text: If its completely off you wont be using any data (no power to use data). If you find that, your using more data then expected while its on, its more likely you have some app running in the background that needs data to operate. An example is the Personal Car insurance app. It requires data and location services to operate, and it’ll run without you knowing it.
